name: Backroom Warfare II
description: Experience the horrors of warfare in the "Backroom Warfare II " Play with friends in multiplayer matches or solo against AI bots. Unearth the terrifying secret of the monster scorestreak, and fight for survival in this intense game. Join the fight and get ready for the most thrilling backroom experience on steam. Backroom Warfare II immerses you in a world of horror, suspense and excitement. Experience the intensity of close-quarters combat and the horrors of modern warfare in this intense first-person shooter. Take on the challenge of amassing an unbeatable monster scorestreak, or battle for survival in the multiplayer or single-player modes. With its stunning visuals, dynamic audio, and intense multiplayer action, Backroom Warfare II is the most fun you'll have in the backrooms without a hazmat suit.
